## Schedule


| Session         | Date / Time (±)  | Topic                                      | Description                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ~               | **Before Day 1** | **Preparation**                            | Complete the [Pre-workshop activities](https://chatgpt.com/c/686b2975-6e08-800f-8701-9c34306eb62b#pre-workshop-activities)—install R 4.x & RStudio, download datasets, run the “Hello R” test script. |
| **Day 1 (4 h)** | 09:00 – 09:15    | **Welcome & Environment Check**            | Quick poll of OS/experience, verify everyone can run code in RStudio.                                                                                                                                 |
| 1               | 09:15 – 10:15    | **Introduction to R & RStudio**            | IDE tour, running code, scripts vs Console, basic data types & structures, importing CSV/Excel.                                                                                                       |
| 2               | 10:15 – 12:15    | **Data Wrangling with tidyverse**          | Hands-on with `filter()`, `select()`, `mutate()`, `group_by()`, pipes (`%>%`).                                                                                                                        |

| 4               | 09:15 – 10:45    | **Basic Inferential Tests**                | One-sample & two-sample _t_-tests, χ² test, one-way ANOVA. Emphasis on interpreting output.                                                                                                           |
